alert.note: Alert for Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:34PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL MONROE AND NORTHWESTERN WETZEL COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodsfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... New Martinsville, Woodsfield, Paden City, Sardis, Fly, Antioch, Graysville, Proctor, Hannibal, and Laings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
